lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Japanese banks and securities houses have fought hard to protect their interests, but analysts said the banks are finding it increasingly difficult to earn money in traditional fields.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. Federal Reserve Bank of New York approved five new primary government securities dealers, including two Japanese brokerages, last December.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. Banks to conduct securities business here, a move that will probably cause the barriers separating Japanese commercial banks from brokerage houses to break down, financial analysts said.
